section.title: Deploying Items
section.para: Oden combines Source where file to be deployed exists and Target where file will be deployed, and manages them in Job format. Deployment execution will be in Job units.

section.title: Job
section.para: Set deployment that records from where to where deployment will be held. Consists of one Source and several Targets.

section.title: Source
section.para: Path in which file to be deployed exists. Exists in system that has installed Oden Server.

section.title: Target
section.para: Location of deployment. Agent should be installed in the related system.
